title: Extent that ideas on race changed 1850-2000

content.question: Evaluate the extent to which European ideas concerning race changed in the period 1850 to 2000.

frqParts.text: Evaluate the extent to which European ideas concerning race changed in the period 1850 to 2000.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
